attributes.action: Scrap Tuition Fees and re-instate Student Grants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We students should not pay fees, they are unfair and were imposed on us by people who enjoyed a free grant-funded education themselves. 
Fees should be scrapped, higher education should be free and people from low-income or modest backgrounds should recieve grants as well

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
